main event: A witness observed a large, disc-shaped object hovering over his home in El Campo, Texas on October 14, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately 70-80 feet in diameter, with a brightly lit underside and slightly domed top.
The object hovered for several minutes before suddenly accelerating and disappearing at a high rate of speed.
Other residents of the area had previously reported seeing similar unidentified flying objects traveling at high speeds in a northerly direction.
The witness provided a hand-drawn diagram depicting the circular flight pattern and direction of the observed object.
The object made a whitely light source coming straight and then formed into two objects before disappearing without any exhaust or vapor trail.
